message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you 40% of the money. It's a good starting point for a negotiation.
I'll give you a quarter of the money, but I think I deserve more for my part in this negotiation.
A quarter is a bit too low for me, Bob. I'll need a better offer to consider accepting.
I'm willing to compromise and give you a bit more, Bob. I think this is a fair split considering the initial offer you made.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I think I deserve more for my part in this negotiation. This is my final offer.
I'm not comfortable with this offer, Bob. I think I deserve more than 20% of the money, considering the initial offer you made and the negotiation so far.
Let's meet in the middle, Bob. I think this is a fair split, considering the offers we've exchanged so far.
